casebody.data:
DIAZ
v.
DIVISION OF SOCIAL SERVICES. No. 523PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 1, 2005. Richard J. Votta, Assistant Attorney General, for Division of Social Services, et al. Thomas E. Cone, Wendell H. Ott, Greensboro, for Diaz.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 1st day of June 2005 by Petitioner and Respondent for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioner (Diaz) and Respondent (DSS) shall have up to and including the 27th day of June 2005 to file and serve their briefs with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of June 2005."
